ide.backend.runtime

Class Runtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • ide.backend.runtime.Runtime
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InterpreterRuntime

    public abstract class Runtime
extends java.lang.Object
    The runtime class used by the IDE to run and compile programs This is an abstract class. This makes it possible to switch the entire runtime/programming language without changing the IDE itself.
    Author:
    Axel
